sample_reviews: A must have in the home. It's easy to clean and definitely works!

I have 2 large dogs and bought these to help clear the air from their hair/dandruff. Plus I live on a dirt road and my house can get dusty real easily. It does really good and the fact that you can clean the filter is a huge bonus. I have one set up in my bedroom and one in my main living area but plan on purchasing another one for the main room due to the size.
IT PROVIDES US WITH A BALANCE IN THE HEALTH OF OUR BREATHING EXCELLENT INVESTMENT
